text.div: • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ParticipationType where concept is-a EXPAGNT

name: ParticipationExposureagent
title: ParticipationExposureagent
description: **Description:** The entity playing the associated role is the physical (including energy), chemical or biological substance that is participating in the exposure. For example in communicable diseases, the associated playing entity is the disease causing pathogen.
